title: Multi-Intelligence-Based Adaptive Language Learning Program: Implementation of Customized Presentation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Customized learning environments for workplace language proficiency improvement, requiring digital device integration and formative assessment-driven feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can utilize at least three learning resources optimized for themselves based on multiple intelligence test results.
Learners can improve language learning outcomes (based on formative assessment criteria) by 20% through adaptive presentation strategies.
Learners can understand the interaction between their preferred learning styles and non-preferred resources and expand their learning strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
